cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.MM. 

The paper discusses a machine learning algorithm that learns a metric function to calculate similarity or distance between samples. This falls under the category of metric learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper also mentions feature learning and deep learning, which are subfields of machine learning as well. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also mentions computer vision (cs.CV), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), natural language processing (cs.CL), and multimedia (cs.MM) as potential applications of the proposed algorithm, so these are also likely sub-categories.
